title: Bump libexpat from 2.6.4 to 2.7.3
body:
## Summary

Update libexpat to 2.7.3 to fix security vulnerabilities.

## Security Fixes

- **CVE-2025-59375** (CVSS 7.5 HIGH) - Memory exhaustion DoS via crafted XML
- **CVE-2024-50602** (CVSS 5.9 Medium) - Parser crash via XML_ResumeParser

## Changes

- Updated `cgmanifest.json` with new commit hash
- Skia DEPS already updated: mono/skia@58763ac5b0

## Related Issues

- Fixes #3389
- Fixes #3425

comments.body: Closing to fix: skill changes should be separate PR, and missing externals/skia submodule update.
